answers.answer: I think j was close to gestational diabetes with my first one. But I didn't get it. Trying extra hard to eat better this time. I did my 1hr test a wk ago. They haven't called so I'm assuming its ok. If u do have it, doesn't mean you will after pregnancy. I'm sure it happens a lot so remember the drs will guide you. Sorry I can't help but I wish you well.
Just worries me I'm only 12 weeks +5 days

Its always scary when you have to go through something "different" but what seems different to you is somewhat common for drs. Once they educate you on this issue you will feel more confident about it. And of course you're worried! You're going to be a mom! Everything worries a mom when its about your baby! You will be fine! Good luck.
Thank u so much ur making me feel better:)

question: So I was wondering has anyone failed there diabetes screaning and had to go back in for a 3 hour where they checked ur sugar every hr? My screaning came back positive so I guess I'm just wondering if that really means I have diabetes? I'm worried I'm at high risk for this pregancy. Thanks for answers:).
title: diabetes screaning
